name: Yesterday's Dishes
description:
Yesterday's Dishes is a short story written in the Twine engine. I wrote it when I was learning HTML/CSS, and it was originally published on my website in 2014 — as such, it probably won't receive any updates. Nonetheless, I thought I'd leave it here as a portfolio piece.

Fullscreen + audio recommended!

The story takes less than 30 minutes to read. It probably won't work on mobile.

If you like some of the ideas explored with the presentation of the text in this story, please check out my current project, Monospaced Lovers. Some of these ideas worked their way into a portion of that game.
